testcase.title: Check that selected terms from Search Aid page gets added to the Bottom query box on Search Aid page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I click on link "Index List:MAN" on page "Advanced Search"
I perform search with query "nickel" on page "Derwent Manual Code" for field "Derwent Manual Code"
I add the terms to the field "Derwent Manual Code" on page "Derwent Manual Code" with flag value "N"
I verify that query "MAN=(G01-A13 OR M26-B08A OR M25-G19)" gets added in bottom query box on "Search Aid" page
I perform search with query "nickel" on page "Derwent Manual Code" for field "Derwent Manual Code"
I add the terms to the field "Derwent Manual Code" on page "Derwent Manual Code" with flag value "N"
I verify that query "MAN=(G01-A13 OR M26-B08A OR M25-G19) OR MAN=(B04-B04D4 OR B04-F0400E)" gets added in bottom query box on "Search Aid" page
